website_summaries.verdict: Solid, sturdy, 4-cup/mug holder with a simple, traditional "colonial" design in black.
pros: Simplicity and sturdiness appear to be the keys to this holder's popularity
Durable due to its solid construction of steel with welded arms and base
Holds 4 cup/mugs, so has a cleaner, simpler look than those holding 2-3 times as many
cons: The dimensions of this holder are 6" x 6" x 6", so take this into account when considering the size of the mugs you will hang on it

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my space
customer_reviews.text: I needed something that would fit on my coffee nook shelf and most of the other mug trees I found were way too tall. This one is just right and fits my mugs great. It helps to get them up off the shelf and honestly just makes the space look better. Quality is great, it does not wobble or bend. Arrived damage free. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Penland

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT addition to your kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mug rack! The great thing is it fits large and small cups. I put my regular coffee cups on this rack until I purchased a cappuccino set. It's nicely made from steel and definitely durable. My cappuccino cups fit nicely and the plates fit perfectly underneath. I absolutely love the way this looks and how functional it is! This is the perfect addition to any kitchen coffee bar. Highly recommend!!! The cappuccino set pictured was also purchased on Amazon. It's the "Konitz Coffee Bar Cups and Saucers". They are great quality and look beautiful on this rack. If you're interested, here's the link:
customer_reviews.author: Wells FamilyTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I had recently purchased some vintage depression glass cups, that really looked closer to mugs. I needed a mug rack that was roomy enough to hang the mugs so they didn't hit against one another. This Mug Rack was perfect, as I only had 4 mugs. It's heavier looking than most of the other mug racks that I looked at. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: E Persons

customer_reviews.title: Coffee mug holder that works for me finally!!
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I have had NO!!! Issues with it.. I just wished arms were out little longer, so mugs don't touch each other. Over all it works for me. Look's nice on my kitchen counter. I have tried two other mug trees that I have purchased from Amazon. Unfortunately, I had to return them. as you can see in photo I have large mugs. Over all this one works for me and I'm happy with it. Maybe down the road, I will change out the mugs I have now for smaller ones.
customer_reviews.author: Partners in crime

customer_reviews.title: NOTICE CUP SIZE IN PHOTO!
customer_reviews.text: Mug rack sits solid on the counter and won't tip over even with only 1 cup on it. Solid construction. Not the prettiest item to look at but it serves it's purpose for my sister. Unfortunately my cups were too tall and they would bang together on this rack. I should have taken a better look at the photo. The cups on the rack are more like standard coffee cups used years ago. In todays world we need COFFEE CUPS!
customer_reviews.author: Linlou

customer_reviews.title: Great Mug Holder to Hold Mugs Safely
customer_reviews.text: Love this mug holder. I was looking for: 1) a mug holder that is heavy enough that it doesn’t topple over when you have just one mug on it 2) each holder is a piece of the base (I lost one of my favorite mugs to a wooden mug holder where the pegs that hold the mugs came out of the base) This fit the bill! Simple and doesn’t make my counter top look cluttered. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Neverland

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I’d like it because the cups will not fall off of it. I do not have any dislikes about it. This is a replacement one, the one I had before I really didn’t like it at all, I don’t even know why I picked it out. The cops kept falling off, only luck none of them actually broke. I don’t understand why I kept it for two years. This one I love, I see nothing wrong with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: phyllis

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect to hold a set of mugs I purchased. It was exactly what I wanted and fits the mugs perfectly. Good quality and no tipping.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Can A Mug Rack Be Adorable? Yes. Yes, it Can.
customer_reviews.text: This is honestly one of my favorite items in my new apartment. It keeps bulky mugs out of my cabinets and, along with my coffee maker and kettle, makes a little coffee/tea bar in the corner of my kitchen. It also lets me display my mugs, which I enjoy looking at because they are awesome. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Agnes Scott

customer_reviews.title: I love this mug rack!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to display the new Moscow Mule copper mugs I received as a gift. It is PERFECT! It appears to be sturdy and well made, and looks fantastic on my counter.
customer_reviews.author: Loves2Read

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sized stand to fit under cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for under my cabinets-other holders were too tall and this is just perfect. Very sturdy. I have really big mugs hanging on it and no balance issue when one is taken off. The mugs do touch but mine are really large and it does not bother me to have them touching. .
customer_reviews.author: M C

customer_reviews.title: Great small mug rack at great price
customer_reviews.text: Really love my little cup rack by Colonial Tin. I have gotten so many good Products from them over the years. This piece is very durable, farmhouse, compact not to take up too much countertop, and can handle a good sized mug. I made a small set of shelves to put by my coffee maker to use as a coffee bar. The rack with the Mugs on it fits perfectly with room to spare on the 10” shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia C. Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Handles both small and large mugs
customer_reviews.text: Have mugs between 15-22oz and all fit just as picture shows...sturdy and well balanced....just be careful placing and removing mugs, as they can swing against each other and chip....no big deal, just takes a second to be careful.
customer_reviews.author: R. Dancel

customer_reviews.title: Exactly right!
customer_reviews.text: Just like picture, and see photo; sturdy but good proportion to the mugs. I can have just 1 mug left hanging and won't tip over.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect

customer_reviews.title: Love this mug stand!

I recommend this item :)

I use it with some tall boys (Culver Serenity Cafe Grande Ceramic Mug, 16-Ounce, Willow Green, Set of 4), and they look like they were made for each other. My mugs are heavy, but the wide base of the rack means they are always sturdy on the counter even when 1-2 mugs are in use. I am very happy with my purchase

product_meta.title: Colonial Tin Works Four Hook Mug Rack (Standard Version)
product_meta.description: Four Hook Mug Rack 6" Wide x 6" Deep x 10" Tall Priced and sold individually. Big enough to hang and display even the largest mugs. Mugs are not included.
feature_bullets: Big enough to hang and display even the largest mugs.
This mug rack is 6" wide 6" deep and 10" high.
